meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6573.

td.p: Ryan Truchelut, a meterologist and graduate student from Tallahassee, Florida
Tom Carroll, a court officer lieutenant from White Plains, New York
Pat Clevenger, a civil engineer from Chalfant Borough, Pennsylvania (whose 1-day cash winnings total $16,100)

tr.td: FROM THE GREEK
CREATURES AMONG US
THE AGE OF MAN
MAJOR LEAGUE BATTING CHAMPS
QUOTES/ MAGAZINES
"I"-PODGE
